title: Calories in Chicken Popcorn
meta_description: Discover calories in chicken popcorn per 100 g serving, including protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and tips for healthier tweaks to fit your diet.
assumptions: Breaded, deep-fried bite-sized chicken pieces; fast-food style with standard seasoning, no added sauces.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, frying method, breading, portion size, and added ingredients. Check labels or apps for exact values.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of chicken popcorn contains about 280 kcal, with 18 g protein and 18 g fat.

label_note: Values mirror standard Nutrition Facts panels for quick label comparisons.

tweaks.label: Baked instead of fried (air-fried or oven)
Add 1 tbsp dipping sauce per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in chicken popcorn per 100 g?
faqs.a: Approximately 280 kcal for breaded, fried chicken popcorn.

faqs.q: Is chicken popcorn high in protein?
faqs.a: Yes, about 18 g protein per 100 g, making it a decent source.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in chicken popcorn?
faqs.a: Around 18 g total fat per 100 g, mostly from frying oil.

faqs.q: How does baking affect calories in chicken popcorn?
faqs.a: Baking reduces calories by about 100 kcal per 100 g compared to deep-frying.

faqs.q: Why is sodium high in chicken popcorn?
faqs.a: Due to breading and seasoning; typically 700 mg per 100 g.
